aims to modify an existing voice to resemble another while retaining the original content and linguistic features . takes a source voice as input and produces an output that mimics a target voice .
audio generation focuses on creating audio from scratch, often WITHOUT a predefined input voice . use cases: TTS, music composition, sound effect generation, speech enhancement 57 .
audioLDM2 converts noise into coherent audio by iteratively refining the signal . audio samples at https://audioldm.github.io/audiodm2/ .
Voice Conversion and Audio Generation Goal Transform a voice to sound like a different speaker . Content Generation does not generate new content (content-preserving)

ChatGPT produces conversational response based on a large language model . DialogFlow (Task-oriented Chatbot) Detects intents and extracts entities from user queries to map them to pre-defined responses

ChatGPT vs DialogFlow Type of AI System Generative, open-ended responses based on context and large-scale data Intent-driven, rule-based responses mapped to predefined structures Conversational Flexibility Flexible
